dmca.title: [ABUSE] Illegal hosting of Lineage 2 files and server
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, December 07, 2004 3:47 PM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Illegal hosting of Lineage 2 files and server

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1


Forwarding to Legal for review.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: NCsoft IP Rights <iprights@ncsoft.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
Date: Tuesday, December 7, 2004, 2:53:05 PM
Subject: [ABUSE] Illegal hosting of Lineage 2 files and server

===8<==============Original message text===============
Hello,



Please review the attached PDF for information on network abuses
occurring on your site.



Thank you for your time,

William Leverett

NCsoft Corporation

Austin, Texas

iprights@ncsoft.com






===8<===========End of original message text===========
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
